arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Bodø/Glimt 0-1 Monaco: Folarin Balogun earns Monaco first win of Champions League campaign
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Matchday 4, 04/11/25 AS Monaco edged Bodø/Glimt (0-1) to earn their first win of this season’s UEFA Champions League campaign. Folarin Balogun’s excellently taken first-half goal was…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Bodø/Glimt: Ansu Fati one of nine absentees
arts.sum: AS Monaco are without a whole raft of first-team players as they prepare to face Bodø/Glimt in the UEFA Champions League on Tuesday night. The Principality club have been struck…

arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 4 Predictions: PSG to end Bayern winning run
arts.sum: Warren Ashurst has provided a correct score prediction for all 18 games on Matchday Four of the Champions League
